=====
dsort
=====


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dsort.svg

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/davur/dsort.svg

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dsort/badge/?version=latest

dsort - sorts YAML/JSON according to a configurable preference


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://dsort.readthedocs.io.
